title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Chesterbrook Condo
description:
This 1,250+ sq ft. home features 2 separate bedroom suites with 2 full baths + a full loft and adjacent (large!) storage space. The Open Concept Living Room/Dining Room/Kitchen features soaring ceilings with skylights, a wood-burning fireplace, and access to a large balcony to enjoy the private backyard overlooking a scenic, tree-lined landscape. Also, enjoy the updated kitchen with granite counters, breakfast bar, and a separate coffee bar, alsong with a full-sized laundry room (with newer W/D), large plank laminate flooring throughout, farmhouse doors and a new, efficient HVAC system.
It's a great location in Eagles Ridge with its walking paths to Valley Forge Park, Chesterbrook community and Wilson Farm Park + convenient to office parks, shopping, and all major roadways to the Philadelphia area, and beyond.
Listed for $2,300/month.

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home with Washer and Dryer
description:
The home at 1602 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 16th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as soon as we remove the staged furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Paper Source, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, and Boyds. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Restaurant Aleksandar, Rosy's Taco Bar, Scarpetta, Trattoria Carina, a.kitchen, DanDan, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Harper's Garden, Harp & Crown, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, Giuseppe & Sons, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a delicious cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished two bedroom two bathroom apartment home on the 16th floor
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave drawer
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home at 1,180 square feet
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
To see if this home is still available for lease, go to our website to see if 1602 is still listed under the Da Vinci floor plan. Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com for the most up-to-date availability!
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!

title: Adorable 2 bed/ 2 bath
description:
See listing for more details: https://www.compass.com/listing/1413-north-corlies-street-philadelphia-pa-19121/1149222957831515137/
Nestled on a quiet block in booming Brewerytown, this charming row home has blended contemporary features with character and charm. A large covered front porch is the welcoming invitation to the interior cozy open floor plan. Three large bay windows bring lots of natural light into the living and dining areas. A bright white kitchen includes modern stainless steel appliances and granite counters and leads out to a spacious back patio, ideal for seasonal grilling and entertaining. The second level features a roomy bedroom overlooking the patio. A full bath complete with a tub shower combo, single sink vanity and stackable washer/dryer sit the adjoining hallway. A spacious primary bedroom with three bay windows and a large double closet sit at the front of the house. A second full bath with a modern shower and vanity sit in the adjacent hallway across from a large linen closet. The large unfinished basement is ideal for extra storage.
Brewerytown corridor is a flux of activity these days. Home to brewpubs like Crime & Punishment, 2632 Brew, and Stones Brew there is also a diverse mix of gourmet burgers, Italian, Jamaican, pizza, soul food, and, of course, Chinese takeout.
Brewerytown Garden provides options for folks who would like to try their hand at urban farming.
Aldi market is close by as well as smaller local venues such as Primal Supply, Bravo Mini Market, Cecil B. Moore Grocery and Jefferson Food Market.
Public transportation routes include Septa Trolley Route 15 on Girard Avenue and Septa Bus Routes: 3, on Cecil B. Moore Ave.; 7, on 27th and 29th streets; 32, on 26th, 27th, 33rd and Poplar streets and Poplar Drive; 48, on 27th, Poplar and 29th streets; 49, on 29th Street

description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $1,325/month for a 18 month lease; or $1,375/month for a 12 month lease.
Beautiful corner unit! This 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment welcomes you into the main living space with exposed brick, large windows for sunlight, & exposed ductwork. The kitchen area is at the back and is fully equipped with white shaker cabinets, subway tile back splash, and sleek stainless steel appliances including a microwave, dishwasher, electric range, and refrigerator. Continue to your stunning bathroom boasting a modern gray vanity and gorgeous shower stall with detailed floor-to-ceiling tiling and a glass door. On the other side of the unit you will find your 2 bedrooms with spacious closets. The corner bedroom is a bit larger and receives a ton of natural light! Unit features hardwood floors, central air, washer / dryer, and recessed lighting throughout!
About The Neighborhood:
Located in Norris Square and walkable to tons of great shopping, eating, and entertainment options. You’ll be surrounded by public transportation bus routes for a quick commute throughout the city. Close proximity to Norris Square Park, Towey Playground, and La Placita Park. Just blocks from fantastic spots including Sunflower Philly, Human Robot, Cousins Supermarket, Luna Cafe, Original 13 Ciderworks, Halftime Goodtimes, Sidekicks Sports Bar & Grill, and countless more!
Lease Terms:
Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apartment Home, City Skyline View, Lounge
description:
The studio apartment home at 2107 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 21st floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as November 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, Tselaine, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Monk's Cafe, Friday Saturday Sunday, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of bread at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio

* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Online resident portal for maintenance requests, rent payments, and more
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by this community and the cost is separate.

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, Washer and Dryer, Gym
description:
The home at 1202 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 12th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as October 31, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Paper Source, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, and Boyds. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Restaurant Aleksandar, Rosy's Taco Bar, Scarpetta, Trattoria Carina, a.kitchen, DanDan, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Harper's Garden, Harp & Crown, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, Giuseppe & Sons, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a delicious cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square

* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi

* Laundry room on every floor

* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room, Special
description:
The studio apartment home at 2111 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 21st floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Restaurant Aleksandar, a.kitchen, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Ultimo, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Take $1,000 Off!
Apply for your new studio apartment home, elect a 10-22 month lease term, sign your lease agreement on or before November 7, 2022, and move into your new home on or before November 30, 2022 to take $1,000.00 off your first month's rent. Certain restrictions apply. Limited time offer.
Community Amenities:
* High-rise on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Online resident portal for maintenance requests, rent payments, and more
* Laundry room with a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 21st floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floors
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2111 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 19 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Package Room, Dog Spa, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2512 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street and South Philadelphia. Be the first to enjoy a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom! This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home will have wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Bella Turka, Ritual Shoppe, Tselaine, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, Veda, The Love, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Bluestone Lane. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a slice of cake at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop for produce and flowers at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There are many banks in the neighborhood, including TD Bank in the building. This building has the best location!

title: 1 Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Concierge, Lounge, Gym
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 2015 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 20th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Bella Turka, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Nail Spa Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Pick up fresh flowers for your home at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 20th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2015 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!
